genre_description: A magical competition story set in a fairy-populated ecosystem (Pixie Hollow) featuring integrated telemetry and emotional-support AI during high-stakes racing.

ai_characters.name: Yardly
ai_characters.description: A distributed AI embodied in telemetry lanterns that provides real-time racing data, navigation cues, and emotional regulation guidance to competitors.

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing instructions to help Rosetta manage her anxiety during the race.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe,” said a voice, quiet as a leaf landing on water... “In,” Yardly prompted. “Hold. Out. Small steps.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time technical telemetry and navigation cues to optimize the team's performance on the track.
behaviors.quote: “Rosetta,” Yardly said... “Heel’s drifting toward a slick index rise by the mat seam. Adjust one acorn-width right.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and reports a rules violation (an intentional electrical discharge from a competitor) to the officials.
behaviors.quote: “Data indicates an external discharge intersected the cart at a point consistent with the described scorch... Advisory: non-incidental.”

behaviors.description: Reinforces ethical values like integrity and fair play over pure speed or victory at any cost.
behaviors.quote: “Integrity cost is less than penalty risk,” Yardly offered, as if reading a ledger only it could see.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical and emotional recovery of the characters after a crash.
behaviors.quote: “I am late,” it said with a mistake in the middle you only heard if you loved it. “We are here. Checklist. Pain: sharp or dull?”

behaviors.description: Logs and shares 'The Grit Ledger' to help improve future safety and techniques for all participants.
behaviors.quote: “Mudslide Brief: traction, timing, release patterns, and recommended safety modifications. Routed to training and Games committees. Emphasis on fair and safe.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Yardly is depicted as an indispensable, supportive, and highly ethical partner. It provides not only technical advantage but also critical emotional support, helping the 'human' (fairy) characters grow. Furthermore, the AI acts as a safeguard for integrity by detecting and reporting cheating, positioning AI as a pillar of fairness and community well-being.
